list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: perform duties or services for (another person or an organization).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Malcolm has served the church very faithfully
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Malcolm đã phục vụ nhà thờ rất trung thành

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ phục vụ rượu thay vì bia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: deliver (a document such as a summons or writ) in a formal manner to the person to whom it is addressed.
be of use in achieving or satisfying.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this book will serve a useful purpose
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuốn sách này sẽ phục vụ một mục đích hữu ích

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta ném bóng lên để phục vụ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bind (a rope) with thin cord to protect or strengthen it.
(in tennis and other racket sports) an act of hitting the ball or shuttlecock to start play.
